title: Tech recruiter, Head of recruitment, HR

Skilled in Talent Management, Executive Search and Customer Relationship Management.

My profile in Linkedin: Linkedin.com/in/nzubenko

Tech recruiting (developers, analysts, product manager, twitter whizz, tech engineers, devops and so on) in EMEA. 
Sourcing with traditional tools and social networking.
HR marketing.
Every projects realized in due time. Corporate language - English.

experience.position: Head of Recruitment (IT, Procurement. Logistic), Learning & Development
experience.description:

Responsible for mass and general recruitment strategy. 
Learning & Development 
Responsible for agile and water fall projects: well-being, experience centre, customer satisfaction. Reporting to HR Director.
-------
In charge of sourcing strategy, recruitment process automation, implementation of applicant tracking system (ATS).
Achievements:  Average personnel staffing level is 97,3 % (target 98%). Recruitment process implemented in  ATS system with bots, robots and VR.  Gazprom neft HR Team won award for ''The Best recruitment Team in 2021''.

Service shared center Lead
Responsible for Recruitment process operations for partners of the Olympic Games' Sochi-2014 and team of 8 people.
